name: Game Over Friend
description: A psychological horror-comedy where a close friend realizes they are trapped inside a video game, twisting reality as the player progresses.

name: Mythros: Hollow Recall
description: A retro pixel-art fantasy adventure set in a world of ancient mysteries, focusing on exploration and atmospheric storytelling.

name: Defective
description: An 8-bit style cooperative puzzle and platforming game where players must work together to solve environmental challenges, but one player is secretly defective.

name: Snow Shoveling Simulator
description: A simple, satisfying progression simulator where players shovel snow, upgrade tools, and earn money to clear increasingly challenging areas.

name: The Traveling Bard
description: A game that combines rythm, adventure, and detective work. The player explores the world playing music for different cities, and must learn what music the people there like.

name: Meadowrise
description: What appears to be, and is advertised as, a simple farming game similar to stardew valley, slowly turns into a horror game.
